H0.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. Karin Slaughter

H1.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. John Grisham

H2.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. James Patterson

H3.text: Who created the fictional special agent Will Trent. Blindsighted

A4.text: Her bestselling thriller series, Will Trent, is now a television series in its 4th season on ABC.

A5.text: Her first novel, Blindsighted (2001), was published in 27 languages and made the Crime Writers' Association's Dagger Award shortlist for 'Best Thriller Debut' of 2001.
